article_title: Obama health care dispute resolved at Westchester Medical Center
article_text:
A dispute between an ‘Obamacare’ insurance plan and Westchester Medical Center has been resolved.

Patients and lawmakers had expressed outrage after the medical center in Valhalla said it could not accept Empire Blue Cross purchased through the state health exchange in Westchester, Rockland and Putnam counties. CEO Michael Israel said the reimbursements from were simply too low to cover the...
